text:
Epilogue:
After the Festival

The day after the festival, the final day of the short-term transfer period.
A modest ceremony was held at the Kiou Police Academy.

name: Hogen
text:
And so, as of this very moment,
I hereby relieve [Player] of the duties assigned during this term.

name: Hogen
text:
It was a brief stay indeed― But, I can only imagine that it
was so incredibly dense, you had a hard time catching your breath, no?

name: Hogen
text:
Normally, the curriculum would have included lectures and elective courses...
But instead you were sent working yourself to the bone.

name: Hogen
text:
To think you would even lead a major incident to its resolution.
Truly impressive! I believe you will continue to flourish,
whether at your original academy, or wherever else you go.

options.text: Too short, I wanted to stay longer.
Don't act like you're innocent, Master.
I didn't do anything, it was thanks to everyone else.

name: Hogen
text:
Now then, how was it for you three?
Tajikarao, Oguchi Magami, and you, Toji.

name: Tajikarao
text:
It was my first time standing against a fellow officer.
My heart was pounding, and everything was very intense...!

name: Oguchi Magami
text:
But in the end, everyone had a great time, so it was a good thing!
Next time, I'd like to participate in the festival properly...

name: Toji
text:
Facing such a situation just days after coming to Kiou...
You were certainly assigned a terrible senior, [Player].

name: Toji
text:
Well, perhaps it wasn't just a problem with Jagannath himself,
but rather a matter of the 'chemistry' between you two.

name: Toji
text:
By the way, is that guy late again?
I hope he hasn't decided to take an unauthorized absence.

options.text: He said he'd come after patrolling.
The streets are still overflowing with bad brats.
Hopefully... It's just him being late.

name: Toji
text:
Good grief... How utterly appalling.
I fail to see how such an officer is even tolerated.

name: Daikoku
text:
—Oh? Wasn't it you who said with such conviction
that officers like him are necessary, Toji-kun?

name: Toji
text:
—!! No, I meant that while I don't approve of everything about him,
he does have some qualities worth observing—

name: Daikoku
text:
Fufu... Well, fine.
It seems we both have our hands full with our 'colleagues'.

name: Daikoku
text:
Indeed, having an officer like him isn't so bad either.
As long as he continues to dance in the palm of my hand, that is.

name: Daikoku
text:
And— [Player]-kun. Having an officer like you on our side is also
quite attractive from various perspectives.

name: Daikoku
text:
We are ready to welcome you at any time.
Allow me to state that clearly once again.

name: Toji
text:
Yes. If it is you, [Player], I'm sure you'll
become an excellent officer unlike any other.

name: Toji
text:
Hopefully, you'd be on my side, rather than his.
Regardless, I would be happy if you can give it a positive thought.

options.text: I'll think about it carefully.
My heart is being torn in two...!
(Shake hands with Toji)

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, shall we call it a day then?
You've done well in an unfamiliar environment, [Player].

name: Hogen
text:
It would be wise to take your time thinking about the future,
but for myself, I'll be eagerly waiting for your return!

[Player] packed their bags and headed toward the gates of the Police Academy.
There, an unexpected figure was leaning against the wall.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Oh, [Player].
So your transfer period is officially over, no?

options.text: No way... You really came to pick me up!?
You're being way too overprotective!
Even though you hated the police...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, I've been worried about you this whole time...
Uncle was the one looking forward to this day more than anyone.

name: Y'golonac
text:
I mean, you were put in more danger than I ever imagined, weren't you?
Facing something like that in just a few days is just wrong!

name: Y'golonac
text:
...As long as you're in the police, Uncle can't stay by your side.
And when Uncle can't be by your side, Uncle's always worried.

name: Y'golonac
text:
And if I worry too much, you'll end up hating me! I don't want that!
Not when our bond has finally deepened again!!

options.text: I'd never hate you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Is that really, really true?
Wait, that doesn't mean that I don't believe you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But [Player], you're my one and only.
The only being in existence that can drive Uncle this crazy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Besides— Even if you say that, your mind's already half-made up about your future career path, haven't you?

options.text: I'm really happy you care that much.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Bzzzzz!! Ahhh, you've completely pierced my heart...
Uncle really is a prisoner of your charms, [Player]...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's why I simply have to do my best.
I want to do everything I can, so I don't have to live with any regrets.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Besides— Even if you say that, your mind's already half-made up about your future career path, haven't you?

options.text: You're such a handful, Papa.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, I got no comeback for that.
After all that talk we had, this is what I get...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But still, [Player], you're my one and only.
The only being that makes Uncle this frantic with love!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides—
Let's be honest, you've probably already got a choice for your future career, haven't you?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle can tell!
After all, we've lived together for so long...

Y'golonac clutched his chest with a look of sorrow, but then,
he suddenly seemed to have a flash of inspiration.

name: Y'golonac
text:
—!! That's it! If you're going to join the police,
then wouldn't it be better if Uncle just joined the police too!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
And then, I'll take that 'buddy' position for myself!
I'll keep you under lock and key, at home and on the job for the rest of our lives!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Right, now that that's settled, I'm going to 'fix' this immediately!
I'm not giving that partner position to anyone else, never!!

options.text: You've got to be kidding!?
I told you I haven't decided yet!!
He can do whatever he wants...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Heheh, to think the solution was this simple!
Hihihi. Alright, see you at home later~ Chu!

name: Y'golonac
text:
—Ah, where's the person in charge of Kiou!?
This Uncle from Kabukicho's here to apply for a 'transfer'!!

name: Police Officer
text:
Whoa, what!? A man from Kabukicho is charging in!?
—S-Someone! Call for backup——!!

Leaving the chaotic Police Academy behind, [Player] encountered
yet another group of unexpected people on the way to the station.

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh, [Player]-sama.
What a coincidence for us to meet in the middle of the city?

name: Color Gang
text:
Yo, [Player]! It's been a while—
Not really, but you know what I mean by that.

options.text: Baphomet!
Yo, former brats~!
What are you all doing together?

name: Baphomet
text:
We have just returned from visiting the
Santa School to offer our formal apologies.

name: Baphomet
text:
We could not have brought everyone with us,
so a few of them came along as representatives of the group.

As Baphomet finished her explanation,
the children looked down with a solemn expression.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Yeah. Both principals were really kind.
It's way too late now, but it really made us reflect on what we did.

name: Color Gang
text:
Especially the Black Principal, he really cared about our futures,
and he actually listened to what we had to say...

name: Color Gang
text:
Yeah, so that's what it means to be a Black Santa.
I had a hunch after talking with Krampus-san, though.

options.text: It looks like you'll be fine now.
You're definitely moving forward.
Have you started to see your future a bit?

name: Baphomet
text:
Before I knew it, all these children have
begun to find actual goals for themselves.

name: Baphomet
text:
Teachers, chefs, engineers, designers.
And— An incredibly strong and kind police officer.

name: Baphomet
text:
Of course, some have not found their own calling yet, but they seem to feel
ready to go back to school and take their time searching.

name: Baphomet
text:
And, even those who have decided not to return to school,
they are living safely under the guidance of their probation officers,
promising to stay in constant contact with me...

options.text: I'm so glad...!
I'll welcome them if they do become my underclassmen.
What about you, Baphomet?

name: Baphomet
text:
For the sake of the children returning to school,
I intend to return to my life as a counselor visiting various academies.

name: Baphomet
text:
The Santa School has also asked for my help,
so things will be busier than ever. And yet—

She paused, tilting her head with a look of contemplation—
And offered a charming smile as she continued.

name: Baphomet
text:
Perhaps I have been influenced by Jagannath-sama, but...
Shamefully, I have found myself wanting to be even more greedy.

name: Baphomet
text:
I am currently considering working as both
a school counselor, and a police psychologist.

name: Baphomet
text:
That way, I can provide the appropriate approach to
both students and those who have dropped out, can I not?

name: Baphomet
text:
—Though, I will not know if such
a thing will be possible unless I try.

options.text: You can do it, Baphomet.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It is heartening to hear you say that, [Player]-sama.
After all, your very existence is like a 'challenge to the impossible'.

options.text: Karma Yoga, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, that is exactly what Jagannath-sama would say.
And just like so, he continues to leave an indelible mark on the hearts of the people...

options.text: I'd love if you could come to Shinjuku...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, perhaps I will someday?
I shall look forward to the day I can visit...
To gaze into the 'devil' within you.

name: Baphomet
text:
But then— [Player]-sama, are you heading back to Shinjuku Academy?
Ah, no, it is already winter break. Then, perhaps you would be returning home?

name: Baphomet
text:
I thought Y'golonac-sama was quite enthusiastic about picking you up...
But it seems that you are not together?

note: nooo, there's no way I can't find another variant of the backgrou—

options.text: There's somewhere I want to go first.
Just some business to take care of.
(Tell her your plans)

text:
Drawn by a faint sense of sentimentality, [Player] stopped by
Asakusa to catch the lingering traces of the festival. There—

name: Motosumi
text:
Oh, what's up, [Player]?
The cleaning and packing's already mostly done, you know?

name: Licho
text:
The 'after-festival' mood is a bit lonely, isn't it...? Ha!
I mean, I'm just glad it didn't end up being a 'disaster'!!!

wooo wordplays that I can't translate
祭りの後 (matsuri no ato / festival's remnants) and 後の祭り (ato no matsuri / remnants' festival)
the latter is a idiom about how something's too late

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I didn't have the chance during the festival, but I wanted to
properly express my gratitude to you, [Player].

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I feel this for Jagannath and Hogen as well, but especially toward you,
who somehow managed to unravel my own stubbornness.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...My position hasn't changed. But with just a change in mindset,
the view I see today is completely different from yesterday.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
The setting sun is always beautiful, but I wonder why...
Watching it with these guys makes it look so much more...

options.text: It means you 'love' everyone, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Love?
Mmm, I have indeed realized that I hold an extraordinary amount of affection for them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm? What are you smirking at?
This feeling for all of you is nothing to be ashamed of!!

options.text: You want to share beautiful things with your precious ones.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, perhaps that's it.
I want to share this beautiful season of youth with them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In this land of Asakusa, where my 'mission' and 'wish' have happily overlapped―
I want to engrave every moment of this into my heart.

options.text: Should I have Baphomet analyze that?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-Wait! There's no need for that!
My interactions with my rival should be kept to a minimum...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides, I've had enough counseling.
I've realized it for myself on a deeper level now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In this land of Asakusa, where my 'mission' and 'wish' have happily overlapped―
I want to engrave every moment of this into my heart.

options.text: I look forward to your guidance, senior.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sure, I'll be in Asakusa.
Whenever, with everything you've got―
Come and face me!

options.text: You're such a romantic, General Manager.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, how can you say such things with that straight face―!?
In a different way from Baphomet, you are a formidable opponent.

options.text: You really do have a cute side.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, how can you say such things with that straight face―!?
In a different way from Baphomet, you are a formidable opponent.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Kaka! For some reason, you're really good at handling him.
I'll have to ask you to deal with it next time Sanat goes out of control.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
By the way, we're all going to wash off the sweat and grime now.
Do you want to join us, [Player]?

options.text: I'll pass for today.
Everyone at Shinjuku is waiting for me.
Will you invite me again next time?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
I see, well, maybe next time.
If you come to Maraque's Pond, I'll scrub your back anytime!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm. Even though you are from 'outside' Asakusa, you are strangely
a part of us. At the very least, everyone here feels that way.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I hope we can continue to clash and elevate each other's souls.
—I am fortunate to have clashed with you this time!!

When [Player] visited the Shinjuku Academy dorms,
they were met with a warm— Perhaps, a bit 'too' warm of a welcome.

name: Ryota
text:
I'm so glad you're back, [Player]~!
I know we'd see you at school, but I was worried if you'd even visit the dorms~!!

name: Shiro
text:
Honestly, didn't we just see each other at the festival?
—But, it really does feel more calming when you're here.

name: Kengo
text:
Shiro's been way too quiet without you, it was boring.
Heh, finally, things are going to get lively again!

options.text: I can feel the love, Ryota.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe, I've got nothing but love!
This body is just overflowing with love for everyone.

options.text: I'm back, Shiro.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, welcome back, [Player].
...It makes me happy to be able to say those words.

options.text: Were you lonely, Kengo?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kengo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-It's not like I was lonely or anything— Dammit.
I was really, really lonely, alright!?

name: Jinn
text:
Welcome back to Shinjuku Academy, [Player]. I'm glad to see
another step of growth in my student from this experience.

name: Jinn
text:
—Not that I'm one to talk, since I was with you the whole time,
but these are my honest feelings, so I can't help it!

name: Triton
text:
Of course, I feel the same way—
No, I feel it even more than him, [Player].

name: Triton
text:
Unlike Jinn-sensei here, I didn't act like a child, but in my heart,
I've been thinking about you, my dear student, this whole time!

name: Jinn
text:
Sorry!? Affection's only worth something if you show it!
Just thinking it doesn't get through to anyone!

name: Triton
text:
A sensible adult should refrain from 'excessive behavior'.
Besides, I went to check on them under the pretext of patrolling!

name: Ryota
text:
So that was just a pretext...
Wait, the Fighting Festival is over, so no more fighting!

name: Ryota
text:
So— You just got back, but have
you decided what to do next, [Player]?

options.text: Everyone keeps asking me that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well of course, everyone's curious!
So many people need you around.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I will absolutely respect your choice, [Player]!
I've sworn to do that, but thinking about it still makes me feel lonely...

options.text: I can't think about anything!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, your transfer period just ended.
But... Does that mean you're 'hesitating'?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I will absolutely respect your choice, [Player]!
I've sworn to do that, but thinking about it still makes me feel lonely...

options.text: I'll cherish your feelings, Ryota.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, [Player]~~!
Sorry... and thank you, really.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I will respect your choice too, [Player]!
I've sworn to do that, but thinking about it still makes me feel lonely...

name: Triton
text:
...[Player] must be exhausted today.
Let's save that for another day.

name: Triton
text:
I want you to know I wish to watch over you until graduation,
but I also want you to sail out into the vast world, unbound by anything.

name: Jinn
text:
Yeah, exactly. My love is greater than Triton-sensei's,
and I've decided to devote it all to my students, but—

name: Jinn
text:
Just as you respected me for who I am,
I'll respect whatever choice you make, [Player].

options.text: Thank you, Jinn-sensei.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, you're my precious student.
That fact won't ever change.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whether you graduate from Shinjuku or another academy,
I'm your Jinn-sensei, and you're my beloved student.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anyway, just take it easy tonight!
You've got tons of things to talk about with your fellow students, don't you?

options.text: You've grown too, teach!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, don't get cheeky with me!
...Is what I'd like to say, but I suppose I'll just have to accept that for today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a fact that I've taken the next step as a teacher thanks to you, Jagannath, and everyone involved in that Tag Match.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anyway, just take it easy tonight!
You've got tons of things to talk about with your fellow students, don't you?

options.text: What about that 'Partner Contract'?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't bring that up again!
That was just me being affected by Y'golonac's 'Rule' and the alcohol...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, okay, it's true that it was how I really felt, but we'll save that kind of talk for the right time...!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-Anyway, just take it easy tonight!
You've got tons of things to talk about with your fellow students, don't you?

name: Jinn
text:
Did you make sure to tell them you're staying overnight?
...Don't worry, I've cleared it with the dorm. Consider it a special case!

name: Jinn
text:
Kyoma-sensei told me not to overdo it, but... just this once!
And tomorrow, shall we have a slightly late Christmas party?

name: Ryota
text:
Ah! That's a great idea! Maybe I'll invite Toji too?
It's been a while since everyone's been together for a party!

name: Ryota
text:
...Yeah. We just have to cherish the present like this.
Heheh, then, what should we do tonight, [Player]!

The next day, as [Player] walked home through the cold night streets,
various faces came to mind.

Those who cling to the places they love, those who break out of their shells,
those who struggle desperately to accept change while fearing it.

Those taking on new challenges, those searching for their next place to belong—
These are the people they met and spoke with during these past few days.

Then, [Player] happened to spot a familiar— No, a person they had
only just truly come to know, among the crowd.

name: Kirito
text:
—Hm. Oh, it's just you, [Player]-san. Wandering around at this hour,
you've really become quite the delinquent yourself.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, you'd better get home before some weirdo messes with you.
Though, I'd feel sorry for whoever makes the mistake of picking a fight with you.

name: Kirito
text:
...This whole experience did make me realize one thing,
and it's that I really do hate you.

name: Kirito
text:
That's all I wanted to say.
Now, I hope we never meet again.

note: bro lives to be a professional hater

options.text: I was happy that we grew closer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I have no idea how you can come to such a convenient interpretation.
Do whatever you want, I'm just going to erase my own tracks.

options.text: How is your relationship with your family?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not like it's any of your business―
But well, I suppose I should say something.
'Thanks to you'.

options.text: Can we get along better from now on?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kirito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Did you even listen? You're weird.
Seriously, go have Baphomet-san check your head.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, I'm off for real this time. At this rate, I feel like we'll just meet
again somewhere soon, so... No, thank you.

Kirito gave a faint smile and
added one last thing as he was leaving.

name: Kirito
text:
...Oh, and by the way, if you're
looking for that guy, he was over there.

name: Kirito
text:
—Haha, he was being an insufferable busybody
with that dead-annoying face of his, as usual.

[Player] walked in the direction Kirito pointed.
The sight that awaited them was exactly as expected—

name: Therian
text:
Geez, just leave us alone already!
We can get home on our own just fine.

name: Therian
text:
You've been tailing us every single night!
Well... See ya tomorrow! You bored-out-of-your-mind cop!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, see ya tomorrow!
Sleep warm, so you don't catch a cold!

Jagannath waved to the brats.
As [Player] watched his side profile, their eyes suddenly met.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh? What are you doing wandering around, little delinquent?
Wait, what's with that resentful look on your face...?

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh, right. Was it because I skipped your departure ceremony?
Don't look at me, the streets are just overflowing with brats, you know.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides— Seeing you off as you leave...
That's just kind of unbearably awkward, isn't it?

He rambled on with uncharacteristic embarrassment, then scratched
his nose and concluded the conversation, trying to hide his feelings.

name: Jagannath
text:
Ah, anyway, tonight's patrol is about done!
I'll walk you back so those guys from Kabukicho or Shinjuku don't give me a headache.

The two of them walked side-by-side down the cold, windy night road.
After sharing a few minutes of silence— The words came naturally.

options.text: From now on, what should I do?
I think I'm suited to being a police officer.
To be honest, I just can't decide...

text:
Jagannath swallowed back whatever
was rising in his throat.

name: Jagannath
text:
...That's not for me to decide. Well, I suppose I've already
let some unnecessary words slip out, though.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I wanted you to learn by watching my back.
I wanted you standing right there beside me.
I meant that from the bottom of my heart.

name: Jagannath
text:
I thought you could become a good 'delinquent cop', or even more than that.
Just thinking about what you could become excited me.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Officers like me aren't exactly needed in large numbers.
But, just one of me isn't nearly enough.

name: Jagannath
text:
If it were you, I bet you'd become a cop just like me—
No, you'd be a better unconventional cop than I can ever be.

name: Jagannath
text:
But, you have countless other possibilities open to you.
Looking at you, it's painfully obvious how much potential you've got.

name: Jagannath
text:
That's why I invited you to Kiou for this short period.
I thought I could make you more interested in taking this path than any other.

name: Jagannath
text:
It's very much unlike me, but that's what I was thinking.
...Maybe I'm still thinking about it now?

options.text: You were much more forceful at first.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-It's because I've spent time with you that I'm being careful?
I've been observing and considering those brats' potential every day!

options.text: Aren't you going to ask me to stand by your side?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I can't say it precisely because you've become so important to me!
I've seen how so many people care about you, so I can't just half-ass it?

options.text: (Stare intently at him)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I know, I know, you're telling me not to get cold feet now, right?
But seriously, your potential is much bigger than you think.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides— There's a thing I've always been telling those brats.
Ultimately, it's up to you to choose your own path.

name: Jagannath
text:
Still, if you were to look at me for who I am,
and truly think you wanted to become my 'buddy'...

Jagannath showed a hesitant, almost clumsy sincerity—
A side of him they had almost never seen before.

His usual fearlessness was gone, leaving only his genuine, heartfelt truth.
As [Player] watched him from very close up—

options.text: Alright— I've decided!
I see, I've...
(Make up your mind)

name: Jagannath
text:
Whoa, wait— Are you serious!?
You don't have to decide that fast!

name: Jagannath
text:
...But, um. Can I ask something just for the record?
You— What kind of path are you planning to take?

Despite his tone, tension bled through his words.
His eyes were a complex mix of expectation and anxiety.
